name: Maluma
description:
'''Juan Luis Londoño Arias''' (born 28 January 1994), known professionally as '''Maluma''', is a Colombian singer, rapper and actor. Born and raised in [[Medellín]], he developed an interest in music at a young age, recording songs since age sixteen. Arias released his debut album, ''[[Magia (Maluma album)|Magia]]'', a year later in 2012. But, his breakthrough album was 2015's ''[[Pretty Boy, Dirty Boy]]'', which led to successful collaborations with many artists. He released ''[[F.A.M.E. (Maluma album)|F.A.M.E.]]'' in 2018, another commercial success. He followed it with ''[[11:11 (Maluma album)|11:11]]'' in 2019, and ''[[Papi Juancho]]'', [[Surprise album|surprise-released]] in 2020. His single "[[Hawái (song)|Hawái]]" (remixed by [[The Weeknd]]) reached number three on the [[Billboard Global 200|''Billboard'' Global 200]], and became the first number one single on the [[Billboard Global Excl. U.S.|''Billboard'' Global Excl. U.S.]] chart. Selling more than 18 million records (albums and singles), Maluma is one of the [[List of best-selling Latin music artists|best-selling Latin music artists]]. Musically, Maluma's songs have been described as [[reggaeton]], [[Latin trap]], and [[Pop music|pop]].

Maluma has a number of singles that have charted within the top ten on ''[[Billboard charts|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Latin Songs]], including "[[Felices los 4]]", "[[Borró Cassette]]", and "[[Corazón (Maluma song)|Corazón]]". His collaborative efforts "[[Chantaje]]" with [[Shakira]] and "[[Medellín (song)|Medellín]]" with [[Madonna]] have reached the top of the Hot Latin Songs and the [[Dance Club Songs]] chart, respectively. He has worked with other international artists, such as [[Madonna]], [[Jennifer Lopez]], [[Ricky Martin]], [[J Balvin]], [[Anitta (singer)|Anitta]], and [[The Weeknd]]. Maluma has won a [[Latin Grammy Award]], an [[MTV Video Music Awards|MTV Video Music Award]], two [[Latin American Music Awards]], and been nominated for a [[Grammy Awards|Grammy Award]] for [[Grammy Award for Best Latin Pop or Urban Album|Best Latin Pop Album]].
